title: 139- John Piper and Women in Leadership
description:
We're in the sticks again with comments from John Piper regarding women in leadership. 

Here is the article and podcast to be contested : https://www.desiringgod.org/interviews/sex-abuse-allegations-and-the-egalitarian-myth


- Mike Erre
